type: Request for Proposal for a Motorized Roller Compactor

description: Please see the description in the solicitation package.
full_summary:
**Motorized Roller Compactor Tender Announcement**
==============================================

**Notice Information**
-------------------------

*   **Title:** Motorized Roller Compactor
*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01005721
*   **Solicitation Number:** W8476-226513/B
*   **Publication Date:** August 30, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 28, 2022, at 2:00 p.m.

**Bidder Information**
---------------------

This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W8476-226513/A, dated May 12, 2022.

**Procurement Details**
-------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to procure one (1) Motorized Roller Compactor for delivery to Edmonton, Alberta. The requested delivery date is 120 days after contract award.

**Key Details**
----------------

*   **Location:** Edmonton, Alberta
*   **Quantity Required:** 1
*   **Delivery Date:** 120 days after contract award
*   **Mandatory Requirements and Deliverables:** Refer to Annex A and Annex B in the solicitation package

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

This procurement does not involve any security requirements.

**Language of Documents**
---------------------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Debriefing Opportunity**
---------------------------

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

**Attachments**
------------------

The following attachments are part of this tender announcement:

*   rfp_amd_001.pdf
*   rfp_amd_002.pdf
*   rfp_amd_003.pdf
*   rfp_b_bt208_w8476-226513.pdf

You can retrieve these attachments from the Canada Buys website at the following links:

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/4be8e9ae6856c009af3cc9d08403c389/rfp_amd_001.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/26/1837ec25ecd81a1af500034fc8cc0ad8/rfp_amd_002.pdf
*   https
